RelatedSentence: SEOUL , May 19 ( Yonhap ) -- The government will mobilize budgets spread among ministries and agencies to better cope with disasters , the finance minister said Monday .

A1: government will mobilize budgets spread among ministries and agencies
RelatedSentence: SEOUL , May 19 ( Yonhap ) -- The government will mobilize budgets spread among ministries and agencies to better cope with disasters , the finance minister said Monday .
The remarks by Hyun Oh - seok , who also serves as deputy prime minister , come as South Korea mourns the deaths of some 300 people in the sinking of the 6,825 - ton ferry Sewol on April 16 .
The remarks by Hyun Oh - seok , who also serves as deputy prime minister , come as South Korea mourns the deaths of some 300 people in the sinking of the 6,825 - ton ferry Sewol on April 16 .

A1: not just the money but also
RelatedSentence: The government will use not just the money but also other diverse budgets assigned for each ministry and agency , and if the amount is not enough , it could redirect other budget spending and tap into reserve funds in order not to cause any problems in providing fiscal support , he added .
